extension.name: joomspirit_99
extension.author: JoomSpirit
extension.description: <script src="../templates/joomspirit_99/lib/js/jscolor/jscolor.js" type="text/javascript"></script> <link rel="stylesheet" href="../templates/joomspirit_99/css/admin.css" type="text/css" /> <link href='http://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Comfortaa:400,300,700|Abel|Arizonia|Berkshire+Swash|Cookie|Dosis:400,200,300,500,600,700,800|Droid+Sans:400,700|Francois+One|Italianno|Lato:400,100,300,400italic,300italic,100italic,700,700italic,900,900italic|Lobster|Lora:400,400italic,700,700italic|Montserrat:700|Oleo+Script|Open+Sans+Condensed:300,300italic,700|Open+Sans:400,300,300italic,400italic,600,600italic,700,700italic,800italic,800|Oswald:400,300,700|Oxygen:400,300,700|PT+Sans+Narrow:400,700|PT+Sans:400,400italic,700,700italic|Prosto+One|Quicksand:400,300,700|Roboto+Condensed:400,300,300italic,400italic,700,700italic|Rokkitt:400,700|Share:400,400italic,700,700italic|Source+Sans+Pro:400,200,200italic,300,300italic,400italic,600,600italic,700,700italic,900,900italic|Ubuntu+Condensed|Ubuntu:400,300,300italic,400italic,500,500italic,700,700italic|Roboto:400,100,100italic,300,300italic,400italic,500,500italic,700,700italic,900,900italic&subset=latin,cyrillic-ext,latin-ext,cyrillic' rel='stylesheet' type='text/css'> IMPORTANT : Read the settings for this template All informations is in your manual. You must double click on the file manual.html You will find in how to configure the template, use the typography and the module positions for your modules.

field.name: color_top_bg
field.label: Background color of the header
field.description: Please set the color. Default : 222222

field.name: sticky_menu
field.label: Main menu fixed or not
field.description: Don't work with IE8-

field.name: scroll_to_top
field.label: Enable the button Scroll to top in the footer

field.name: color_text_general
field.label: General color of text
field.description: Please set the color. Default : 555555

field.name: width_website
field.label: Width of your website in px or %
field.description: Enter the width of your website in px or %. Example : 1200px or 80%. Default : 980px

field.name: width_left
field.label: Width of left module position in px or %
field.description: Enter the width of the left module position in px or % . Default : 200px

field.name: width_right
field.label: Width of right module position in px or %
field.description: Enter the width of the right module position in px or % . Default : 200px

field.name: user1_width
field.label: Width of user1 in percentage
field.description: Enter the width for user1 in percentage. Space between each user module = 2%. Default : 32

field.name: user3_width
field.label: Width of user3 in percentage
field.description: Enter the width for user3 in percentage. Space between each user module = 2%. Default : 32

field.name: user4_width
field.label: Width of user4 in percentage
field.description: Enter the width for user4 in percentage. Space between each user module = 2%. Default : 32

field.name: user6_width
field.label: Width of user6 in percentage
field.description: Enter the width for user6 in percentage. Space between each user module = 2%. Default : 32

field.name: color_website_title
field.label: Color of the website_title
field.description: Please set the color. Default : 97BD18

field.name: font_website_title
field.label: Font for your website title
field.description: The font with an * are safe fonts. No need to load an extra font file on your website and support all special characters.

field.name: custom_font_website_title
field.label: New Google font for your website title
field.description: Copy the code of your Google font. More details in the manual.

field.name: website_title_fontsize
field.label: Font size of your website title
field.description: value in % or px. Example : 160% or 18px . Default : 50px

field.name: color_main_menu_item
field.label: Color of main menu item
field.description: Please set the color. Default : 888888

field.name: color_main_menu_item_active
field.label: Color of active menu item
field.description: Please set the color. Default : cccccc

field.name: color_main_menu_subitem
field.label: Color of sub menu item
field.description: Please set the color. Default : 666666

field.name: color_main_menu_subitem_active
field.label: Color of active sub menu item
field.description: Please set the color. Default : 97BD18

field.name: font_menu
field.label: Font for your menu and article title
field.description: The font with an * are safe fonts. No need to load an extra font file on your website and support all special characters.

field.name: custom_font_menu
field.label: New Google font for menu and article title
field.description: Copy the code of your Google font. More details in the manual.

field.name: main_menu_fontsize
field.label: Font size of main menu parent items
field.description: value in % or px. Example : 160% or 18px . Default : 140%

field.name: text_menu
field.label: Text in the menu button (small screen)
field.description: Only in small screen with Responsive feature enable. default : menu

field.name: width_slideshow
field.label: Width of the module position image in px or %
field.description: If you choose a value in percentage, the minimum width is always 980px. Example : 1200px or 80%. Default : 980px

field.name: colorh1
field.label: Color for article title (H1)
field.description: Please set the color for your article title H1. Default : 97BD18

field.name: font_h1
field.label: Font for title H1
field.description: The font with an * are safe fonts. No need to load an extra font file on your website and support all special characters.

field.name: custom_font_h1
field.label: New Google font for title H1
field.description: Copy the code of your Google font. More details in the manual.

field.name: h1_fontsize
field.label: Font size for title H1
field.description: value in % or px. Example : 160% or 18px . Default : 220%

field.name: colorh2
field.label: Color for module titles and H2
field.description: Please set the color for titles H2 and each module title. Default : 663D26

field.name: font_h2
field.label: Font for module titles, H2, H3, H4 and H5
field.description: The font with an * are safe fonts. No need to load an extra font file on your website and support all special characters.

field.name: custom_font_h2
field.label: New Google font for module titles, H2, H3, H4 and H5
field.description: Copy the code of your Google font. More details in the manual.

field.name: module_title_fontsize
field.label: Font size of the module titles
field.description: value in % or px. Example : 160% or 18px . Default : 130%

field.name: h2_fontsize
field.label: Font size for titles H2
field.description: value in % or px. Example : 160% or 18px . Default : 150%

field.name: h3_fontsize
field.label: Font size for titles H3
field.description: value in % or px. Example : 160% or 18px . Default : 115%

field.name: h4_fontsize
field.label: Font size for titles H4
field.description: value in % or px. Example : 160% or 18px . Default : 110%

field.name: h5_fontsize
field.label: Font size for titles H5
field.description: value in % or px. Example : 160% or 18px . Default : 100%

field.name: font_content
field.label: Font for your content
field.description: The font with an * are safe fonts. No need to load an extra font file on your website and support all special characters.

field.name: custom_font_content
field.label: New Google font for your content
field.description: Copy the code of your Google font. More details in the manual.

field.name: color_link
field.label: Color for your links
field.description: Please set the color for your links. Default : 80A114

field.name: color_link_hover
field.label: Color for active and hover links
field.description: Please set the color for your active links. Default : 97BD18

field.name: color_text_social
field.label: Color of the social icons text
field.description: Hexadecimal code color . default : 555555

field.name: custom_icon01
field.label: Url of a custom social link

field.name: custom_icon01_img
field.label: Select an icon
field.description: You can add your own image in the folder 'images/social-icons' of the template

field.name: custom_icon02
field.label: Url of a second custom social link

field.name: custom_icon02_img
field.label: Select an icon
field.description: You can add your own image in the folder 'images/social-icons' of the template

field.name: custom_icon03
field.label: Url of a third custom social link

field.name: custom_icon03_img
field.label: Select an icon
field.description: You can add your own image in the folder 'images/social-icons' of the template

field.name: custom_icon04
field.label: Url of a fourth custom social link

field.name: custom_icon04_img
field.label: Select an icon
field.description: You can add your own image in the folder 'images/social-icons' of the template

field.name: responsive
field.label: Enable responsive feature
field.description: The design change when the screen resolution is less of 980 pixels : better for mobile devices

field.name: column_responsive
field.label: Display left and right column under the content in small resolution
field.description: Disable this option if you use a javascript animation in your column.

field.name: animation
field.label: Enable animations
field.description: Disable this option if you doesn't want use any animation on scroll

field.name: animation_social
field.label: Enable animation for the Social icons

field.name: animation_social_text
field.label: Customize this effect
field.description: Default effect : enter top move 10px after 1.5s over 1.33s

field.name: animation_translate
field.label: Enable animation for the module position Translate

field.name: animation_translate_text
field.label: Customize this effect
field.description: Default effect : enter top move 10px after 1.5s over 1.33s

field.name: animation_logo_text
field.label: Customize this effect
field.description: Default effect : enter left wait 0.3s move 20px over 1.33s

field.name: animation_menu
field.label: Enable animation for the main menu

field.name: animation_menu_text
field.label: Customize this effect
field.description: Default effect : enter top move 0px over 2s

field.name: animation_breadcrumb
field.label: Enable animation for the module position Breadcrumb

field.name: animation_breadcrumb_text
field.label: Customize this effect
field.description: Default effect : enter top move 12px over 1.33s

field.name: animation_left
field.label: Enable animation for the Left column

field.name: animation_left_text
field.label: Customize this effect
field.description: Default effect : enter top move 12px over 1.33s

field.name: animation_right
field.label: Enable animation for the Right column

field.name: animation_right_text
field.label: Customize this effect
field.description: Default effect : enter top move 12px over 1.33s

field.name: animation_top
field.label: Enable animation for the module position Top

field.name: animation_top_text
field.label: Customize this effect
field.description: Default effect : enter top move 12px over 1.33s

field.name: animation_user1
field.label: Enable animation for the module position user1

field.name: animation_user1_text
field.label: Customize this effect
field.description: Default effect : enter left move 12px over 1.33s

field.name: animation_user2
field.label: Enable animation for the module position user2

field.name: animation_user2_text
field.label: Customize this effect
field.description: Default effect : enter top move 10px over 1.33s

field.name: animation_user3
field.label: Enable animation for the module position user3

field.name: animation_user3_text
field.label: Customize this effect
field.description: Default effect : enter right move 12px over 1.33s

field.name: animation_article_text
field.label: Customize this effect
field.description: Default effect : enter top move 12px over 1.33s

field.name: animation_user4
field.label: Enable animation for the module position user4

field.name: animation_user4_text
field.label: Customize this effect
field.description: Default effect : enter left move 12px over 1.33s

field.name: animation_user5
field.label: Enable animation for the module position user5

field.name: animation_user5_text
field.label: Customize this effect
field.description: Default effect : enter bottom move 10px over 1.33s

field.name: animation_user6
field.label: Enable animation for the module position user6

field.name: animation_user6_text
field.label: Customize this effect
field.description: Default effect : enter right move 12px over 1.33s

field.name: animation_bottom
field.label: Enable animation for the module position Bottom

field.name: animation_bottom_text
field.label: Customize this effect
field.description: Default effect : enter top move 10px over 1.33s

field.name: animation_search
field.label: Enable animation for the module position Search

field.name: animation_search_text
field.label: Customize this effect
field.description: Default effect : enter left move 12px over 1.33s

field.name: animation_address
field.label: Enable animation for the module position Address

field.name: animation_address_text
field.label: Customize this effect
field.description: Default effect : enter left move 12px over 1s

field.name: animation_bottom_menu
field.label: Enable animation for the module position Bottom_menu

field.name: animation_bottom_menu_text
field.label: Customize this effect
field.description: Default effect : enter right move 12px over 1s
